name: Movers and Shakers
description:
This was my entry for the Quarantine Jam held at the beginning of May 2020. The theme was "Pack," so I came up with an idea to have a guy who moves people's things around using a box.

You get to choose from a small, medium, or large box, and you can choose whether to move 5, 15, or all 25 people on the map. There's a timer as well, although it only counts up (no pressure). Depending on the box you pick, you can carry more or less things, but your speed will decrease!

Controls:

  • Left and Right arrow keys move
  • Up and Down arrow keys will transition between blocks (just look for the arrows)
  • Spacebar is the action key (talking, picking up and dropping off things)
  • Ctrl + M toggles music
  • Ctrl + S toggles sound effects
  • Ctrl + F toggles full screen
  • Ctrl + R restarts game
  • Ctrl + Q quits the game

... there's also a hidden CHEAT key. Think you can figure out how to toggle it?
